t: Redeem Promotional Codes and Courtesy Credits - Amazon Customer Service
s: Promotional codes can only be redeemed at the time you place an order.

t: Redeem an Amazon Gift Card - Amazon Customer Service
s: When you redeem an Amazon.com Gift Card or gift voucher to your account, the funds are stored in Your Account and will automatically apply to your next eligible order.

t: Brand Gift Cards - Amazon Customer Service
s: The Brand Gift Cards have a 12-month expiry period. The mode of redemption of the Brand Gift Cards may vary from online redemption to in-store redemption depending on the brand.

t: Redeem a Product Voucher - Amazon Customer Service
